ValidationRule.description: Checks to ensure key fields are populated where the status of the LOA is LOA Received Awaiting Information or LOA Rejected Internal
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
(ISPICKVAL(MainLOAStatus__c, "LOA Received Awaiting Information") || ISPICKVAL(MainLOAStatus__c, "LOA Rejected Internal"))
&&
(ISBLANK( Date_LOA_sent_to_provider__c ) || ISBLANK( Date_Last_Chased__c ) || ISBLANK( LOA_Financial_Account__r.Public_Provider_Name__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure there are values for date sent to provider, date last chased, and provider on the financial product.
